com.cloudant.sync.datastore
Class RevisionHistoryHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.cloudant.sync.datastore.RevisionHistoryHelper

public class RevisionHistoryHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Methods to help managing document revision histories.

This class is not complete, but should bring together a set of utility methods for working with document trees.

Method Detail

getRevisionPath

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRevisionPath(com.cloudant.mazha.DocumentRevs documentRevs)

Returns the list of revision IDs from a DocumentRevs object.

The list is (reverse) ordered, with the leaf revision ID for the branch first.

For the following input:

 {
 ...
 "_revisions": {
   "start": 4
   "ids": [
   "47d7102726fc89914431cb217ab7bace",
   "d8e1fb8127d8dd732d9ae46a6c38ae3c",
   "74e0572530e3b4cd4776616d2f591a96",
   "421ff3d58df47ea6c5e83ca65efb2fa9"
   ],
 },
 ...
 }

The returned value is:

 [
   "4-47d7102726fc89914431cb217ab7bace",
   "3-d8e1fb8127d8dd732d9ae46a6c38ae3c",
   "2-74e0572530e3b4cd4776616d2f591a96",
   "1-421ff3d58df47ea6c5e83ca65efb2fa9"
 ]

Parameters:
documentRevs - DocumentRevs object to process
Returns:
an ordered list of revision IDs for the branch, leaf node first.
See Also:
DocumentRevs

revisionHistoryToJson

public static java.lang.String revisionHistoryToJson(java.util.List<DBObject> history)

Serialise a branch's revision history, in the form of a list of DBObjects, into the JSON format expected by CouchDB's _bulk_docs endpoint.

Parameters:
history - list of DBObjects. This should be a complete list from the revision furthest down the branch to the root.
Returns:
JSON-serialised String suitable for sending to CouchDB's _bulk_docs endpoint.
See Also:
DocumentRevs
